articles.author: Lifestyle Asia
articles.title: Goodbye E3 Expo: Long-running video game trade show calls it quits - Lifestyle Asia Bangkok
articles.description: E3, a long-running videogame trade show, on Tuesday said the event will no longer take place, ending a 20-year run.
articles.content:
The main organiser of E3, a long-running videogame trade show, on Tuesday said the event will no longer take place, ending a 20-year run.
“After more than two decades of serving as a central showcas… [+1012 chars]
